text: Yad nɨbop mapen yɨbɨl lɨl, gos tep nɨgɨlɨg mɨdebin. Yɨp nag lel mɨdebin akaŋ, takaw teplep ak, takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl mɨdeb binɨb okok kɨlop agñɨ tep gɨl kɨles gɨl apin ak, God yɨp yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gek wog ne kɨles gɨl gebin. Pen nɨbi yɨp gos nɨŋɨd gɨñem, chɨn ayɨp jɨmñɨl wog gobun. Anɨb ak tek, gos teplep yad won ak nɨbop nepin ak, teplep yɨbɨl.
